helplines.title: Befrienders KL
helplines.body:
Emotional support hotline.

Confidential, free, non-judgemental.

24 hours, everyday.

Contact Befrienders suicide helpline:

03-76272929

Befrienders KL official website: https://www.befrienders.org.my/

helplines.title: Befrienders Penang
helplines.body:
WhatsApp service can be contacted through 011-56706261 and may use either Bahasa Malaysia, English or Mandarin

Offers face-to-face befriending at their center, strictly through appointment. Please call Befrienders Penang to arrange the meet up.

Operating hours from Monday to Sunday (3pm to 12 midnight).

Address:
 Counselling Centre Penang (The Befrienders) Pulau Pinang,
Mewah Court, Blok 104 â€“ 1A,
Jalan Tan Sri The Ewe Lim,
Pulau Pinang, 11600

General call number:
04-2910100

Contact email: pat@befpen.org

Befrienders Penang official website: https://befpen.org/

Official Facebook page: https://m.facebook.com/befrienderspenang
